About

Meet our Consultant...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Christy Stevenson, is a firm believer that outer order creates inner calm. With this philosophy and the KonMari Methodâ„¢, she believes that helping people organize their homes not only creates a more beautiful living environment but can help create a more harmonious life.
Christy has received a Bachelor of Science from the University of Hawaii, attended the KonMari™ Consultant Certification Course in Los Angels and is a KonMari™ Consultant Trainee.
Organization has been a life long passion and she hopes that through Space & Harmony she will be able to share her passion with you.
